RelatedSentence: Pol Lt Somchai Makchuay , of Muang district police station , said Mayako Paji , 37 , was attacked by an assailant hidden on a road side with a shotgun while returning home on a motorcycle at about 1.45 am .

Pol Lt Somchai Makchuay , of Muang district police station , said Mayako Paji , 37 , was attacked by an assailant hidden on a road side with a shotgun while returning home on a motorcycle at about 1.45 am .
Mayako was hit many times in the body but managed to speed away to see a friend , who took him to Yala Hospital for treatment .
